qas.question: What police force covers the ceremonial county

answers.text: Somerset is covered by the Avon and Somerset Constabulary, a police force which also covers Bristol and South Gloucestershire

qas.question: What fire / rescue squad was formed in 2007

answers.text: The Devon and Somerset Fire and Rescue Service was formed in 2007 upon the merger of the Somerset Fire and Rescue Service with its neighbouring Devon service

qas.question: What area does South western Ambulance  Service cover

answers.text: covers the entire South West of England, including all of Somerset

qas.question: What is the name of the charitable air ambulance service

answers.text: The Dorset and Somerset Air Ambulance

qas.question: In what year was the South Western Ambulance Service established?
In what year was the Avon and Somerset Constabulary formed?
What type of organization is the Great Western Ambulance Service?
What ambulance service covers the North West of England?
In what year was the Dorset and Somerset Air Ambulance organization formed?

context: All of the ceremonial county of <a0_0>Somerset is covered by the Avon and Somerset Constabulary, a police force which also covers Bristol and South Gloucestershire<a0_0/>. <a1_0>The Devon and Somerset Fire and Rescue Service was formed in <b4_0><b5_0><b8_0>2007<b8_0/><b5_0/><b4_0/> upon the merger of the Somerset Fire and Rescue Service with its neighbouring Devon service<a1_0/>; it covers the area of Somerset County Council as well as the entire ceremonial county of Devon. The unitary districts of North Somerset and Bath & North East Somerset are instead covered by the Avon Fire and Rescue Service, a service which also covers Bristol and South Gloucestershire. The <b7_0>South Western Ambulance Service<b7_0/> <a2_0>covers the entire South West of England, including all of Somerset<a2_0/>; prior to February 2013 the unitary districts of Somerset came under the Great Western Ambulance Service, which merged into South Western. <a3_0>The Dorset and Somerset Air Ambulance<a3_0/> is a <b6_0>charitable<b6_0/> organisation based in the county.
